text: I've got so much I want to tell you, that I do not consider him answerable for what he says.

passages.fragment: I've got so much I want to tell you ,
passages.full_quote: "<used>I've got so much I want to tell you," s</used>he had said

passages.fragment: to tell you , that I do not
passages.full_quote: I had made up my mind <used>to tell you, that I do not</used> believe a word of it, she may lose the opportunity of fixing him; and it will be wickedly ungrateful if you refuse

passages.fragment: that I do not consider him answerable for what he says .
passages.full_quote: I should wish it put on record <used>that I do not consider him answerable for what he says</used>.
